Alpha Testing.description: Item relates to a feature in Alpha testing

Beta Testing.description: Item relates to a feature in Beta testing

Breaking Change.description: Indicates that the bug fix or new feature introduces a breaking change

Documented.description: Item that was previously labelled 'Needs Documentation' has had this completed

EX-CommandStation.description: Item relates to the core EX-CommandStation code

Needs Clarification.description: Need more information from the requestor

Needs Testing.description: Item has not been unit and/or regression testing

Reviewed.description: Item previously labelled 'Needs Review' has been reviewed

Support Request.description: Item is a request for support

To Do.description: General work task to be completed

Will Not Fix.description: Feature will not be implemented, or bug will not be fixed
